---
title: CSS Ghost
description: "Pure CSS ghost created for the <a href='https://32bit.mysteryslug.com/events/halloween-2023/'>32bit.cafe Halloween 2023 challenge</a>."
image:  data:image/png;base64,
date: 2023-10-25
rss: true
style: '
    * {
        cursor: url("https://cdn.custom-cursor.com/db/10498/32/cute-ghost-cursor.png") , auto !important
    }
    .cssghost {
        align-items: center;
        background-color: black;
        display: flex;
        height: 100vh;
        max-height: 1000px;
        min-height: 600px;
        border-radius: 0.75rem;
        justify-content: center;
        margin: 0 0 2rem 0;
        padding: 0;
        overflow: hidden;
        position: relative;
    }

    .cssghost .ghost {
        width: 275px;
        height: 400px;
        position: relative;
        z-index: 1;
        animation: hover 3s ease-in-out forwards alternate infinite;
    }

    .cssghost .ghost::before {
        content: "";
        background: white;
        border-radius: 150px 150px 30px 30px;
       --ghostwiggle: 
        linear-gradient(to top,#0000 30px,#000 0),
        radial-gradient(30px,#000 98%,#0000) bottom/55.50px 60px;
        mask: var(--ghostwiggle);
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        right: 0;
        bottom: 0;
    }

    .cssghost .ghost .smile {
        width: 40px;
        height: 20px;
        border-radius: 15px 15px 100px 100px;
        background: black;
        background-size: 40px;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        background-position: center 20px;
        position: absolute;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        top: 150px;
        overflow: hidden;
        positiont: relative;
    }
    .cssghost .ghost .smile::before {
        content: "";
        width: 100%;
        aspect-ratio: 1 / 1;
        background-color: deeppink;
        border-radius: 100px;
        position: absolute;
        top: 10px;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
    }

    .cssghost .ghost .arms::before,
    .cssghost .ghost .arms::after {
        content: "";
        width: 100px;
        height: 60px;
        background: white;
        position:absolute;
        top: 200px;
    }

    .cssghost .ghost .arms::before {
        left: -60px;
        border-radius: 60px 0 0 100px;
        transform: rotate(25deg);
        animation: armleft 3s ease-in-out forwards alternate infinite;
        transform-origin: center right;
    }
    
    .cssghost .ghost .arms::after {
        transform: rotate(-25deg);
        left: auto;
        right: -60px;
        z-index: -1;
        border-radius: 0 60px 100px 0;
        transform: rotate(-25deg);
        animation: armright 3s ease-in-out forwards alternate infinite;
        transform-origin: center left;
    }

    .cssghost .ghost .eyes::before,
    .cssghost .ghost .eyes::after {
        content: "";
        height: 60px;
        width: 60px;
        background-color: black;
        background-image: radial-gradient(circle, rgba(255,255,255,1) 20%, rgba(0,0,0,1) 22%);
        background-position: -10px -10px;
        border-radius: 60px;
        position: absolute;
        top: 100px;
    }
    .cssghost .ghost .eyes::before {
        left: 50px;
    }

    .cssghost .ghost .eyes::after {
        right: 50px;
    }

    .shadow {
        background: rgba(255,255,255,0.15);
        width: 200px;
        height: 50px;
        border-radius: 100%;
        position: absolute;
        bottom: 50px;
        left: 50%;
        transform: translateX(-50%);
        animation: shadow 3s ease-in-out forwards alternate infinite;
    }

    @keyframes shadow {
        0% {
            transform: translateX(-50%) scale(0.9);
        }
        100% {
            transform: translateX(-50%) scale(1.1);
        }
    }
    @keyframes hover {
        0% {
            transform: translateY(-10px);
        }
        100% {
            transform: translateY(10px);
        }
    }

    @keyframes armleft {
        0% {
            transform: rotate(25deg);
        }
        100% {
            transform: rotate(15deg);
        }
    }
    @keyframes armright {
        0% {
            transform: rotate(-25deg);
        }
        100% {
            transform: rotate(-15deg);
        }
    }'
scripts: '<script>sparkles(["ðŸ‘»"])</script>'
---

  <div class="ghost">
    <div class="eyes"></div>
    <div class="smile"></div>
    <div class="arms"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="shadow"></div>

<div class="reading-width">
    <p>Depicts a cute round ghost with huge shiny eyes and an open smile (you can see his pink tongue!). Animated to hover up and a down with his arms moving slightly and a shadow underneath.</p>
</div>
